question:
Which of the following is true about Gulf of Mannar Biosphere Reserve?
  1. It forms part of Laccadevi Sea in the Indian Ocean
  2. It has mangroves also
Select the correct answer from the codes given below-
explanation: Gulf of Mannar is one of the Biosphere Reserve and is included in the UNESCO's list of Man and Biosphere Reserve Program. Some part of it lies in Sri Lanka. It is a part of Laccadevi Sea and has evergreen broad leaf vegetation, estuaries and mangroves.
